resources.string: Reset values to\nAndroid- or DarkKat default?
Reset colors to\nAndroid- or DarkKat default?
To use the weather feature, the app LockClock \'cLock\' has to be installed
To use the weather feature, enable the app LockClock \'cLock\', and reboot your phone
To use the weather feature, enable the app LockClock \'cLock\', and reboot your tablet
If the icon is an greyscale icon
Close the color picker without applying the new color, (cancel).\nThis has the same effect as clicking the back button on the navigation bar.
Only shows the title, no additional functions
The color preview is always visible.\nIf the new color doesn\'t equals the old color, the color preview will be expanded, to allow apply the new color.
Resets the new color to the default Android or Darkkat color without applying the new color.

Shows the hex input field.
Hex values have to be in hex color format:
'#aarrggbb', ('alpha' (transparency), 'red', 'green' and 'blue').
The back button closes the hex input field without setting the hex value.
The apply button sets the hex value as new color without applying the new color.
Shows/hides the favorites.\nHiding the favorites will not reset the favorite colors.
Pick a color to set a new color without applying the new color.\nThe color range can be changed using the slider on the right side

Favorites are empty by default.\nThe new color can be saved as a favorite at any time via long click, (a none empty favorite will be overwritten by the new color).\nA click sets the favorite color as new color, without applying the new color.
All palette colors have a fixed value.\nA click sets the favorite color as new color, without applying the new color.
Maximum number of buttons has been reached
It is not possible to delete last entry
It is not possible to delete required buttons
Disabled\nAdd an entry to enable this feature
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app.
The chosen action cannot be added twice
, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the reset option.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Enable to show the music visualizer on the lock screen
Enable to use the general lock screen icon color, disable to create the color from the lock screen background automatically
Enable to show the weather location
Arrange the buttons, and choose the buttons to display on the aditional button bar.
Enable to use the general lock screen ripple effect color, disable to create the color from the button bar icons automatically
Enable to hide the button bar, as soon as there isn\`t enough space to show all visible notifications
Enable to show the camera button on the right side
Choose when to show the ambient display
Enable to show the battery status
Enable to show the additional button bar
The additional button bar is disabled
Enable to turn on the ambient display in predefined intervals (normally between 10- and 60 seconds) for a new notifications
Customize the user icon & multi user switch on the lock screen
Customize the user icon on the lock screen
Choose the status bar background type
from bottom left to top right
from bottom right to top left
from top right to bottom left
from top left to bottom right
Enable to use a center color for the gradient
Enable to adjust brightness by sliding across status bar
Double tap the status bar to put the device to sleep
The greeting will be shown after the device gets unlocked
The greeting will be shown only the first time the device gets unlocked after the boot
The greeting will never be shown
Enter a new text, which will be shown as greeting. An empty field will revert the text to:\n\'%s\'
Enable to show the (custom) carrier label on the status bar
Enable to show the (custom) carrier label on the status bar of the lock screen
Enable to use a custom carrier label
Enter a new custom label to display instead of the real carrier name. An empty field will revert the name to \'Darkkat\'
Enable to choose a number of visible notification icons to hide the (custom) carrier label on the status bar
Enable to show the date next to the clock in the status bar
Enabe to display the date small sized
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Enable to show the percentage text
The circle won\'t be shown dotted
Enable to cut the percentage-text/charging-indicator out of the battery icon, if the battery fill overlaps the percentage-text/charging-indicator.
Enable to show the bar on lock screen
Enable to show the charging animation
Percentage text & charging indicator (light status bar)
Choose which icons should be visible/hidden
Enable to choose a number of visible notification icons to hide the weather on the status bar
Enable to show the network traffic
Enable to show the network traffic on lock screen
Enable to show the values in bit instead of byte
Enable to hide the indicator if the current network speed matches or is below the threshold
The traffic indicator will be hidden, if the current network speed is %1$s
The traffic indicator will be hidden, if there is no traffic
Choose a threshold to hide the traffic indicator
Enable to use the icon as activity indicator, disable to hide the icon if the current network speed matches or is below the threshold
Choose when to pull down to the expanded view directly
Always pull down to the expanded view directly
Pull down to the expanded view directly, when there are no dismissable notifications present
Pull down to the expanded view directly, when there are no persistent notifications present
Pull down to the expanded view directly, when there are no notifications present
Never pull down to the expanded view directly
Choose which area of the status bar is used to pull down to the expanded view directly
Enable to show the carrier name
Enable to show the wifi network name
Advanced settings aren\'t supported by currently shown bars
Ripple color isn\'t supported by currently shown bars
Text color isn\'t supported by currently shown bars
Enable to show the quick access bar
Enable to show the brightness slider bar
Enable to show the wifi network bar
Enable to show the mobile network bar
Enable to show the battery status bar
Enable to show the weather bar
The app LockClock \'cLock\' is not installed, disable to hide the weather bar.
The app LockClock \'cLock\' is disabled, disable to hide the weather bar.
Arrange the buttons, and choose the buttons to display on the quick access bar
The quick access bar is curremtly hidden
The battery status bar is curremtly hidden
The weather bar curremtly is hidden
Wifi- & mobile network bars are hidden
Enable to show the additional battery bar
Enable to show the current weather along with day forecasts for the next 4 days, disable to show the today\'s forecast along with forcasts for the next 4 days
Customize the back-, home- and recents button
Choose how to display the cursor arrow-, ime switcher and menu button
Enable to close the current app on long click
Enable to open Google Now on long click
Enable to switch to the last app on long click
Show left and right cursor buttons while typing. Longpress to navigate up/down. The buttons for IME switcher and menu will be hidden.
Enable to show the menu button on the left/bottom (portrait/landscape), disable to show the menu button on the right/top (portrait/landscape).
Enable to show the ime button on the left/bottom (portrait/landscape), disable to show the ime button on the right/top (portrait/landscape).
Enable to show the menu button on the left, disable to show the menu button on the right.
Enable to show the ime button on the left, disable to show the ime button on the right.
If the notification doesn\`t include an own color
View or change how the clock and alarm of the \'cLock\' Home widget will display
View or change how the weather panel of the \'cLock\' Home widget will display
View or change how the calendar events of the \'cLock\' Home widget will display
Enable to show the progress icon
Show recent apps panel on the left edge
Enable to show only apps which are currently running
Enable to show the topmost task
Enable to use a custom color for the app name, disable to use white on dark backgrounds and black on light backgrounds
Enable to use a custom color for the expand button icon, disable to use white on dark backgrounds and black on light backgrounds
Enable to use a custom color for the icon on empty recent apps view, disable to use white on dark backgrounds and black on light backgrounds
Swap volume buttons when the screen is rotated
Enable to turn the screen on when pressing the volume button up/down
Enable to show advanced options in the reboot menu
Arrange the buttons, and choose the buttons to display in the power menu
Turn the screen on when connecting or disconnecting the charger
